General.Name: Zhuzhou Smelter Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhuzhou Smelter Group Co.,Ltd. produces and sells lead, zinc, and alloy products in China. The company offers zinc ingots, hot-dip galvanized, and cast zinc alloys under the Torch brand. It is also involved in the recovery of copper, silver, cadmium, indium, and other metals and sulfuric acid. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Zhuzhou, China.
